name: Improved Feint Partner

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Bluff 1 rank, Combat Reflexes, Feint Partner, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: Whenever an ally who also has this feat successfully feints against an opponent, that opponent provokes an attack of opportunity from you.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Knowledge of your companions' tricks and techniques allow you to take even greater advantage of your allies' feints.
